In environment h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R H : x < fst h Unable to unify "SF_nil x" with "{| SF_h := fst (head (fst h, fst h) (if Rle_dec (fst h) x then (fst h, fst h) :: (if Rle_dec (SF_h ptd) x then (SF_h ptd, snd h) :: seq_cut_down (SF_t ptd) x else [:: (x, Rmin (snd h) x)]) else [:: (x, Rmin (fst h) x)])); SF_t := behead (if Rle_dec (fst h) x then (fst h, fst h) :: (if Rle_dec (SF_h ptd) x then (SF_h ptd, snd h) :: seq_cut_down (SF_t ptd) x else [:: (x, Rmin (snd h) x)]) else [:: (x, Rmin (fst h) x)]) |}".

original: intros h ptd x H. unfold SF_cut_down. unfold SF_cons. simpl. intros Hx. rewrite Hx. reflexivity.
